full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LHA BCU GSUM MA'I SGRUB THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LHA BCU GSUM MA'I SGRUB THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DAM PA BYAMS PA ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL BZANG PO'I GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR, DZA YA BANTI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA 'DI KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
